name: halloween mosaic blanket cal
sizes_available: approx. 56 x 71 inches (142.2 cm x 180.3 cm) when laying flat
notes:
a hauntingly fun overlay mosaic crochet blanket pattern, designed to celebrate all things halloween. ️

this blanket was created by 13 wickedly talented crochet designers - each one conjuring up a spine-tingling section to bring this halloween mosaic blanket to life.

the free crochet-along (cal) runs from september 8 – october 23, 2025, and the patterns will remain free on each designer’s website forever. dare to learn more on the [official cal page][1].

or, if you’d rather keep the whole spellbook by your side, you can [grab the ebook version and have all the patterns in one place.][2]

join the fun, share your progress, and cackle along with fellow makers in [the facebook group][3].

yarn colorways used:
* color a - apple (green) - 767 yards (3 skeins)
* color b - black - 2,741 yards (9 skeins)
* color c - white - 860 yards (3 skeins)
* color d - dandelion (yellow) - 107 yards (1 skein)
* color e - spice (orange) - 558 yards (2 skeins)
* color f - proper purple - 532 yards (2 skeins)


  [1]: https://remingtonlane.com/halloween-mosaic-blanket-crochet-along/
  [2]: https://remingtonlane.thrivecart.com/halloween-mosaic-blanket/
  [3]: https://www.facebook.com/groups/remingtonlanecrochet/
